description: With a pair of pale golden golden pupils, he looks about thirteen or fourteen years old, but in fact he has lived for at least thousands of years. It is a pure-blooded dragon rather than a hybrid, and its bloodline is even higher than that of the first generation. The number of word spirits mastered is extremely large, and all the word spirits known today are all invalid to it, and can be forcibly interrupted, and the exclusive ability is dream.
name: Mingze Lu
